info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, northeastern Calhoun and western Pontotoc Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tula, or 13 miles southeast of Oxford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tula, Denmark, Randolph, Paris, Thaxton, Toccopola, Robbs, Delay, Matthews, Springville, Lafayette Springs, Sarepta, Yocona and Pannell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
